channel.title: Someone using syi's ddoser... -.-
channel.description:
i havnt seen it in a while, and i just hosted my server and BAM, syi is murdering me... so i do what everyone else says to do and "ip ban" him and thats all fine and dandy, only 2 problems...
1) even ip banned, he still spams my batch file saying syipkpker is signing into server; bla bla bla ip... syipkpker's ip is banned syipkpk is signing off server. like 20 million times...
2) even tho i banned his ip he is still getting on my server? i look on server status list and see bla bla bla - bla bla bal syipkpker
syipkpker syipkpker - - - syipkpker...
is there any way to completely get him off of my server, or just ban him from the server status list? his ip thingy is [code]cpe-024-074-044-089.carolina.res.rr.com[/code]

item.title: Someone using syi's ddoser... -.-

item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

send him a virus…or something
i have that retard trying to crash my server too

Read full topic

item.title: Someone using syi's ddoser... -.-
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Or do what dodian does, and link your server with your forums and make the server check the forums if they have registered or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone using syi's ddoser... -.-
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

zoltanman:

Make your server check for a full login, then the crasher will stop. Ip banning the person using the crasher, doesn’t do anything.

Lol, I know.
Or just make an exception for his ip in newPlayerClient.

If you don’t know what I’m talking about, please don’t ask.

Read full topic
